ai_analysis.summary: Payer has a prior escalation count; policy mandates rejection despite the low fraud score.
reasoning: Policy Override: Escalate_Count = 1 triggers an automatic REJECT per the payer-based escalation policy, overriding all other criteria.
Low ML Risk: While the ensemble model indicates 0.0% fraud risk (RF 29.7%, XG 27.7%), the escalation policy is absolute.
No Conflicting Red Flags: Signature is present and no amount mismatches or date anomalies detected, but these do not supersede the escalation rule.
actionable_recommendations: Notify the payer of the rejection citing policy on repeated suspicious submissions.
Document this transaction and escalation flag in the customer’s file for audit purposes.
Advise front-line staff to verify payer identity rigorously in any future submissions.
